description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this parentâ€“child form relationship record.
Human-readable identifier or code for the child form/transaction type tied to the parent form; likely used as the label shown to users; confirm with SME.
Free-text description of the child form or relationship, providing context for users; meaning may vary by implementation; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the parent form definition this child form belongs to; references the forms/master table to group related transactions.
Identifier of the child form definition linked under the parent form; references the forms/master table to enable navigation to related transactions.
Identifier of the user who created this relationship record.
Date/time when this relationship record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this relationship record.
Date/time when this relationship record was last modified.
